Name: Battle Imagine - Void Ogre
Description:
Use to activate or upgrade Void Ogre's Battle Imagine skill: Stunt! Chaotic Barrage.

Stunt! Chaotic Barrage
Summon Elite: Void Ogre, roars in place, and fires 6 whirlwind-like Void Projectiles at the target, dealing Attack Damage. Inflicts Void Corruption Decay on the target for 10s, dealing Magic Damage per second, up to 5 stacks. 100% of the DMG dealt over time is converted into your HP.
Description$english:

Stunt! Chaotic Barrage
Summon Elite: Void Ogre, roars in place, and fires 6 whirlwind-like Void Projectiles at the target, dealing Attack Damage. Inflicts Void Corruption Decay on the target for 10s, dealing Magic Damage per second, up to 5 stacks. 100% of the DMG dealt over time is converted into your HP.
Description2$english: A crystallization of thoughts, consciousness, and Engram, possessing supernatural power. This principle has not been unraveled since the Bapharian civilization.
